vote.title: Authorize a three-year cooperative purchasing agreement for the purchase of Rapid7 InsightVM licenses, training, and subscription services for a vulnerability management solution for the Department of Information and Technology Services with Cyber Watch Systems, LLC through the Texas Department of Information Resources Cooperative agreement - Not to exceed $ 286,907.40 - Financing: DHS 2024 Homeland Security UASI Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
